short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlankSlate is an open-source, lightweight new tab extension designed for users who prefer a clean and minimal browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlankSlate is an open-source, sleek and simple new tab extension designed for users who want a clutter-free browsing experience. With a minimalist interface and no unnecessary frills, BlankSlate provides a blank canvas for users to start their browsing session, making it the perfect choice for those who value simplicity and efficiency.
